an1.11:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanno va kamacchando uppajjati uppanno va kamacchando bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, subhanimittam.
an1.11:1.2: Subhanimittam, bhikkhave, ayoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva kamacchando uppajjati uppanno ca kamacchando bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati”ti.
an1.12:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanno va byapado uppajjati uppanno va byapado bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, patighanimittam.
an1.12:1.2: Patighanimittam, bhikkhave, ayoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva byapado uppajjati uppanno ca byapado bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati”ti.
an1.13:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppannam va thinamiddham uppajjati uppannam va thinamiddham bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, arati tandi vijambhita bhattasammado cetaso ca linattam.
an1.13:1.2: Linacittassa, bhikkhave, anuppannanceva thinamiddham uppajjati uppannanca thinamiddham bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati”ti.
an1.14:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppannam va uddhaccakukkuccam uppajjati uppannam va uddhaccakukkuccam bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cetaso avupasamo.
an1.14:1.2: Avupasantacittassa, bhikkhave, anuppannanceva uddhaccakukkuccam uppajjati uppannanca uddhaccakukkuccam bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati”ti.
an1.15:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va vicikiccha uppajjati uppanna va vicikiccha bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, ayonisomanasikaro.
an1.15:1.2: Ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppanna ceva vicikiccha uppajjati uppanna ca vicikiccha bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati”ti.
an1.16:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanno va kamacchando nuppajjati uppanno va kamacchando pahiyati yathayidam, bhikkhave, asubhanimittam.
an1.16:1.2: Asubhanimittam, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva kamacchando nuppajjati uppanno ca kamacchando pahiyati”ti.
an1.17:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanno va byapado nuppajjati uppanno va byapado pahiyati yathayidam, bhikkhave, metta cetovimutti.
an1.17:1.2: Mettam, bhikkhave, cetovimuttim yoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva byapado nuppajjati uppanno ca byapado pahiyati”ti.
an1.18:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppannam va thinamiddham nuppajjati uppannam va thinamiddham pahiyati yathayidam, bhikkhave, arambhadhatu nikkamadhatu parakkamadhatu.
an1.18:1.2: Araddhaviriyassa, bhikkhave, anuppannanceva thinamiddham nuppajjati uppannanca thinamiddham pahiyati”ti.
an1.19:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppannam va uddhaccakukkuccam nuppajjati uppannam va uddhaccakukkuccam pahiyati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cetaso vupasamo.
an1.19:1.2: Vupasantacittassa, bhikkhave, anuppannanceva uddhaccakukkuccam nuppajjati uppannanca uddhaccakukkuccam pahiyati”ti.
an1.20:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va vicikiccha nuppajjati uppanna va vicikiccha pahiyati yathayidam, bhikkhave, yonisomanasikaro.
an1.20:1.2: Yoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppanna ceva vicikiccha nuppajjati uppanna ca vicikiccha pahiyati”ti.
